Title: Relates to the placement of homeless shelters
Summary: Requires the city of New York to consult with the community board of the district and all local elected officials where a proposed homeless shelter or use of commercial hotel space to shelter homeless individuals shall be located, at least three hundred sixty-five days beforehand.
LawCode: Add ยง21-124.2, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the placement of homeless shelters
